Package com.foreach.across.core.context.configurer

Class ApplicationContextConfigurerAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.core.context.configurer.ApplicationContextConfigurerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationContextConfigurer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnnotatedClassConfigurer, ComponentScanConfigurer, PostProcessorConfigurer, PropertySourcesConfigurer, ProvidedBeansConfigurer
public abstract class ApplicationContextConfigurerAdapter extends Object implements ApplicationContextConfigurer
Adapter class that implements the ApplicationContextConfigurer interface. Provides default empty implementations for all beans.

  • Method Details

    • providedBeans

      public ProvidedBeansMap providedBeans()
      Returns a map of beans to register directly in the ApplicationContext. Provided beans will be registered first, before any of the annotated classes or defined packages are loaded.
      Specified by:
      providedBeans in interface ApplicationContextConfigurer
      Returns:
      Map of bean name and value.
      See Also:
      • ProvidedBeansMap

    • annotatedClasses

      public Class[] annotatedClasses()
      Returns a set of annotated classes to register as components in the ApplicationContext. These can be annotated with @Configuration.
      Specified by:
      annotatedClasses in interface ApplicationContextConfigurer
      Returns:
      Array of annotated classes.

    • componentScanPackages

      public String[] componentScanPackages()
      Return a set of packages that should be scanned for additional components.
      Specified by:
      componentScanPackages in interface ApplicationContextConfigurer
      Returns:
      Array of package names.

    • postProcessors

      public org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanFactoryPostProcessor[] postProcessors()
